headline: A Look At Willis Towers Watson (WTW) Valuation After Recent Share Price Move
summary: Why Willis Towers Watson Is On Investors’ Radar Today Willis Towers Watson (WTW) is drawing fresh attention after its recent share move, with the stock last closing at $329.41. This has prompted investors to revisit how its advisory and broking business is currently positioned. See our latest analysis for Willis Towers Watson. While the 1-day share price return of 0.28% drew attention, the longer record is more subdued, with a year to date share price return of 0.96% and a 5 year total...
